list_definition.definition: the recording or broadcasting (by means of a video recorder) of television pictures and sound

list_definition.definition: (also video cassette recorder; VCR) a machine used for watching or recording television films and programmes on videotape.
to record on a video recorder or videotape

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He videoed a television programme on volcanoes.
